/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves mostly bare, suggesting it might be late autumn or early spring. A few trees still have some green leaves, providing a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth to the scene. In the distance, a bus can be seen, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life.
